General.Name: pferdewetten.de AG
General.Description: pferdewetten.de AG, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the online horse betting business in Germany and internationally. Its horse betting services range from betting on German gallop and trotting to English, French, and other international horse races. The company also offers consulting and training services for the implementation and processing of sports and horse betting; and technical services, such as server services, web development, video streaming, payment systems, content management, and shop solutions. The company was formerly known as Sportwetten.de AG. pferdewetten.de AG was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Düsseldorf, Germany.
